info.title: phpList API Documentation
info.description: This is the OpenAPI documentation for phpList API.

get.summary: Gets a list of all templates.

post.description: ðŸš§ **Status: Beta** â€“ This method is under development. Avoid using in production. Returns a JSON response of created template.

file.description: Optional file upload for HTML content

check_links.description: Check that all links have full URLs

check_images.description: Check that all images have full URLs

check_external_images.description: Check that all external images exist

get.description: ðŸš§ **Status: Beta** â€“ This method is under development. Avoid using in production. Returns statistics overview for campaigns.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of campaigns to return

parameters.name: after_id
parameters.description: Last seen campaign ID for pagination

get.description: ðŸš§ **Status: Beta** â€“ This method is under development. Avoid using in production. Returns statistics for view opens.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of campaigns to return

parameters.name: after_id
parameters.description: Last seen campaign ID for pagination

get.description: ðŸš§ **Status: Beta** â€“ This method is under development. Avoid using in production. Returns statistics for the top domains with more than 5 subscribers.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of domains to return

parameters.name: min_subscribers
parameters.description: Minimum number of subscribers per domain

get.description: ðŸš§ **Status: Beta** â€“ This method is under development. Avoid using in production. Returns statistics for domains showing confirmation status.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of domains to return

get.summary: Gets a list of all subscribers of a subscriber list.

parameters.description: emails of subscribers to delete from list.

get.summary: Gets the total number of subscribers of a list

Array of privileges where keys are privilege names and values are booleans
